capabilities.name: enhanced_page_analyzer
capabilities.description: Analyze a page with screenshots, console logs, interactive element mapping, and performance metrics

capabilities.name: api_endpoint_tester
capabilities.description: Test multiple API endpoints and verify responses

capabilities.name: navigation_flow_validator
capabilities.description: Test a sequence of user actions across multiple pages

capabilities.name: screenshot_url
capabilities.description: Take a screenshot of a URL

capabilities.name: dom_inspector
capabilities.description: Inspect DOM elements and their properties

capabilities.name: console_monitor
capabilities.description: Monitor console logs on a page

capabilities.name: performance_analysis
capabilities.description: Analyze page performance metrics

capabilities.name: visual_comparison
capabilities.description: Compare two URLs visually and highlight differences

capabilities.name: batch_screenshot_urls
capabilities.description: Take screenshots of multiple URLs and display them in a grid

capabilities.name: screenshot_local_files
capabilities.description: Take screenshots of local HTML files in a directory

capabilities.name: playwright_navigate
capabilities.description: Navigate to a URL

capabilities.name: playwright_click
capabilities.description: Click an element on the page

capabilities.name: playwright_iframe_click
capabilities.description: Click an element in an iframe on the page

capabilities.name: playwright_fill
capabilities.description: Fill out an input field

capabilities.name: playwright_select
capabilities.description: Select an option in a dropdown

capabilities.name: playwright_hover
capabilities.description: Hover over an element on the page

capabilities.name: playwright_evaluate
capabilities.description: Execute JavaScript in the browser console context

capabilities.name: playwright_console_logs
capabilities.description: Retrieve console logs captured so far

capabilities.name: playwright_get_visible_text
capabilities.description: Get the visible text content of the current page

capabilities.name: playwright_get_visible_html
capabilities.description: Get the HTML content of the current page

capabilities.name: playwright_go_back
capabilities.description: Navigate back in browser history

capabilities.name: playwright_go_forward
capabilities.description: Navigate forward in browser history

capabilities.name: playwright_press_key
capabilities.description: Press a keyboard key (optionally focusing an element first)

capabilities.name: playwright_drag
capabilities.description: Drag an element to a target location

capabilities.name: playwright_screenshot
capabilities.description: Take a screenshot of the current page or a specific element

capabilities.name: ui_workflow_validator
capabilities.description: Execute and validate a sequence of UI interactions simulating a user workflow.
